m_szDocTitle: Will Tesla (TSLA) Stock be Affected by Battery Business Competition? - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Will Tesla (TSLA) Stock be Affected by Battery Business Competition? By Amanda Schiavo | 05/04/15 - 09:09 AM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) --Last Thursday Tesla Motors ( TSLA - Get Report ) unveiled its residential and commercial-scale batteries at an event outside of Los Angeles as part of the electric car makers plan to generate new revenue, and Reuters is reporting that Tesla may not be as far ahead of the competition as it believes.
